狄仁傑.definition: Di Renjie (607-700), Tang dynasty politician, prime minister under Wu Zetian, subsequently hero of legends; master sleuth Judge Dee, aka Chinese Sherlock Holmes, in novel Three murder cases solved by Judge Dee 狄公案[Di2 gong1 an4] translated by Dutch sinologist R.H. van Gulik 高羅珮|高罗佩[Gao1 Luo2 pei4]

狄俄倪索斯.definition: Dionysus, the god of wine in Greek mythology

狄公案.definition: Dee Gong An (or Judge Dee's) Cases, 18th century fantasy featuring Tang dynasty politician Di Renjie 狄仁傑|狄仁杰[Di2 Ren2 jie2] as master sleuth, translated by R.H. van Gulik as Three Murder Cases Solved by Judge Dee

狄奧多·阿多諾.pinyin: Di2 ao4 duo1 · A1 duo1 nuo4
狄奧多·阿多諾.definition: Theodor Ludwig Wiesengrund Adorno (1903-1969), German sociologist, philosopher, musicologist, and composer

狄更斯.definition: Dickens (name); Charles Dickens (1812-1870), great English novelist
